{"id":1005933568,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1690527271,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1005933568/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"6.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxPower(string s) {\n        int res = 1, tmp = 1;\n        for (auto i = 1; i < s.length(); i++)\n            if (s[i] == s[i - 1]) {\n                tmp++;\n                res = max(res, tmp);\n            } else {\n                res = max(res, tmp);\n                tmp = 1;\n            }\n\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
